A N M Bazlur Rahman

Java Champion & Software Engineer

I'm a Software Engineer with over a decade of professional experience in the software industry, primarily focused on Java and related technologies. In 2022, I was honored with the title of Java Champion, recognizing my contributions to the Java community.

üöÄ Current Projects

  • Writing "Modern Concurrency in Java" for O'Reilly Media
  • Editor for the Java Queue at InfoQ
  • Contributing author at Foojay.io

üåü Community Involvement

  • Founder and moderator of the Java User Group in Bangladesh since 2013
  • Most Valuable Blogger (MVP) at DZone
  • Author of five bestselling books about Java programming in Bengali

üéì Education & Background

  • Bachelor's degree in Information Technology
  • Major in Software Engineering
